description: Add this basic butter cake to your baking repertoire. Dust it with icing sugar or top it with a dreamy vanilla frosting; this moist cake is a classic for birthdays, celebrations or just because.
keywords: Butter cake,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Baking,Peanut free
name: Basic Butter Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease and line base of a 20cm cake tin. Beat butter and sugar together until light and creamy.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well between each. Add vanilla. Fold in half the flour, then half the milk. Repeat with the remaining flour and milk and be careful not to over-mix.
Transfer batter to pan. Bake for 30-35 minutes until cake is well risen and golden. Dust with icing sugar.
